body:
Stuff like this are usually artist self inserts.
At least he stayed true to his fatass character.
Bruh this is some dumb shit tho.
I don't think this has been uploaded enough times yet.

@reyas actually men are the problem in Japan if you look at any surveys of Women they want men that actually speak their mind and show emotion, which Japanese men overall dont do. Thats why often when they are asked about their interest in foreign men a lot of women express great interest due to modern Japanese culture making a large portion of their population unappealing to women.
The only thing that changed from the previous upload is on page 37 where Madoka is now listed as being in middle school instead of high school.

"The most contributing factor (to low fertility rate)  was considered to be men's lack of interest in relationships" , lmao.  Literally the one thing that it absolutely can't be,  is what the author chose. I've seen that parroted in propaganda efforts too.  FUN FACT: Nations  with low fertility rate like Japan suffer that problem because of WOMEN. Typically they become spoiled by corrupt govt giving them favoritism & amenities against which most men cannot compete against so women reject/mistreat all of those men by default. It's women that are the bottleneck. That's why this  problem cannot be caused by 'men's lack of interest'. Ever.
they got this one up 10 times but they aint even have the first part in English smh lol
This is good not upload 10 times good
